column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////FOOD: I am a traditionalist
column2: so I got a Tonkatsu Black. The broth itself was very good. I found the broth not overly seasoned
column5: but had the right amount of fat in it for a good bowl of ramen. The noodles as well came out just right. Prefect consistency
column7: and quantity was good. The pork on the Tonkatsu was a bit leaner
column8: and I think that's okay. I prefer a little bit more fat on my pork for a nice bowl of ramen
column9: but I think a bit leaner cut is good too.
